testcase.name: Attempt to create an order with insufficient product quantity
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Attempt to create an order with insufficient product quantity Given a product exists with a quantity of "1" ... passed in 0.593s When I attempt to create an order with a quantity of "2" for that product ... passed in 0.025s Then I should receive a "400" status ... passed in 0.000s And I should see an error message "Insufficient quantity" ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Attempt to view a product that does not exist
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Attempt to view a product that does not exist When I attempt to view the product with ID "9999" ... passed in 0.004s Then I should receive a "404" status ... passed in 0.001s And I should see an error message "Product not found" ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Attempt to register with an already taken email
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Attempt to register with an already taken email Given a user already exists with the email "existinguser@example.com" ... passed in 0.548s When I attempt to register with the email "existinguser@example.com" ... passed in 0.002s Then I should receive a "400" status ... passed in 0.000s And I should see an error message "Email already exists" ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
